events.message: I am filing a claim for my car accident that happened yesterday. My vehicle was severely damaged after colliding with another car at the intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the details provided regarding the collision.
An agent has been assigned to handle your auto accident claim and will be in contact for further updates.
Your claim has been acknowledged and is now officially in processing. We are here to assist you through the process.
Please submit photographs of the damaged vehicle and the police report to help with the investigation of your auto accident claim.
I have uploaded the requested images of my car and the official police accident report for your review.
The investigation team has begun assessing the details and evidence submitted regarding the car collision incident.
The investigation into your auto accident claim is now complete, confirming the liability on the third party involved.
We have proposed a settlement amount to cover the damages to your vehicle based on the inspection report.
I am satisfied with the proposed settlement as it fairly covers the costs to repair my car after the accident.
Your auto accident claim has been approved, and we are proceeding with the payment arrangements promptly.
The agreed settlement payment has been issued to your account to cover repair expenses for your damaged vehicle.
Your auto accident claim is now officially closed. Thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
The files and documents related to your vehicle collision claim have been archived for future reference if needed.
